attributes.title: Black lives matter

attributes.review: This app is horrible! First off, it took my 2 years to download. Right when it finished downloading my screen was flooded with oranges and my sound muted (extremely rude especially since I was trying to listen to Juicewrld’s new album “Legends Never Die”. I eventually fixed this problem by rebooting my phone. The phone took 20 mins to reboot!!! When it finally rebooted i tried deleting the app but every time I tried to delete it 2$ was taken from my paypal account so I eventually stopped trying. Later when I was trying to watch pornhub my phone started to record from the front camera and screen record. I was so scared that I went in my room and tried to sleep it off. In my dreams I was met with oranges with limbs chasing me screaming “GIVE BACK MY WIG!” When I woke up I immediately brought another phone and discarded my old one. I would give this app 0 stars but unfortunately 1 Star is the least you can give.

attributes.review: I’m honestly so frustrated. I tried to download this app to see what it was all about. I’d do anything to support my president... but this app is truly atrocious. First of all it took hours to load, then when it finally did I couldn’t even open the app. As soon as the app loads it crashes and leaves you on your home screen again. I’ve tried many many times and have still been unsuccessful in trying to use this app.  I expected better from my president. This needs to be fixed immediately. Unexeptable
attributes.title: Worst experience of my life
